comment: pretty solid math teacher! was very helpful and accessible outside of class. would def recommend him.
Amazing professor very clear teaching of course material wants to make sure all his students succeed best teacher highly recommend

The best professor I've ever had omg!!! I cannot recommend him enough, I am horrific at math but this professor is so caring, understanding, and relatable and makes sure everyone is set up to succeed. the only problem is Alex but that's not something he can control but does a good job at preparing you for it.

Drew cares very much about his students' success and understanding of the material, he's a younger guy (in his 20s) so it's much easier to talk to him as a peer. 
He explained concepts in math in easy to understand ways and succinctly made up for gaps in my education from 3rd grade up to college. It's a shame he isn't teaching higher level math yet

I'm glad I chose him for 1113. I've spoke with other friends taking the same course and their professors were comparably more difficult. His lectures are easy to comprehend and straight to the point, offers extra credit opportunities, and genuinely wants you to succeed. He prepares you for tests and the only "hard" part is catching up with aleks.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback
